The video was shared on Facebook on May: 2020, with a caption mentioning a face-off between Chinese and Indian troops in Sikkim.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify found the same footage published on YouTube on January 13, 2020, with a title mentioning a border argument between Chinese army and Indo Tibetan Border Police in Arunachal Pradesh.
Oriental Daily News: a Hong Kong newspaper, reported on the footage in a Chinese language article on January 18, 2020, with a headline translating to "Video of China-India border standoff circulates online / People's Liberation Army officer roars: Get lost if you are not up for a fight."
